actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4945 (g) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make it clear that nothing in that provisions authorizes the limitation of the grants awarded by a private foundation to a fixed percentage of the number of applicants for such grants.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Internal Revenue Code, the limitation of the grants awarded by a private foundation to a fixed percentage of the number of applicants for such grants. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 4945 (g)).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4945 (g) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make it clear that nothing in that provisions authorizes the limitation of the grants awarded by a private foundation to a fixed percentage of the number of applicants for such grants.
